name: h3
description: Introducing the 2026 Victus Vibe Pro-Crayon Juco Mint Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat, a game-changer for aspiring sluggers. This bat boasts a mid-balanced swing feel, thanks to its innovative one-piece alloy construction and 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, ensuring optimal performance on the field. The mint and black colorway stands out, while the authentic Juco King (Eric Sims) signature adds a touch of prestige. Engineered with VXP Alloy, it promises increased pop and extended durability, complemented by a ringless barrel construction for a thinner, more flexible sweet spot. The ergonomic handle taper and micro-perforated soft-touch grip enhance control and feel, making it a top choice for serious players. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
